author: jfthomps
msg: VCL-664 - hard coded references to "Local Account"
-modified submitLogin: added $authtype parameter for call to localLogin

-modified localLogin: added $authtype argument; changed addLoginLog calls to use passed in $authtype for 2nd parameter instead of 'Local' and to use it to get the right affiliationid from the $authMechs array instead of hard coding 'Local Account'; use $authtype as parameter for calling printLoginPageWithSkin instead of hard coding 'Local Account'
